name: doc-via-doxygen
description: Azure DevOps extension for generating documentation using Doxygen

scripts.build: npm run build:pipeline-task && npm run build:code-hub && npm run build:extension
scripts.build:pipeline-task: tsc --project tsconfig.pipeline-task.json && copy src\pipeline-task\task.json dist\pipeline-task\ && echo { "name": "doc-via-doxygen-task", "version": "1.0.0", "main": "index.js" } > dist\pipeline-task\package.json
scripts.test: npm run test:pipeline-task && npm run test:code-hub
scripts.package:extension: cd src/extension && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --output-path ../../dist/extension/

author: satishc
